chunk_prompt: Summarize this discussion focusing on the main points related to: symptoms, warning signs, medical emergency, urgent care
final_prompt: Summarize this discussion focusing on the main points related to: symptoms, warning signs, medical emergency, urgent care

sentences.text: they freaked out saying i needed to go to the emergency room immediately.
they asked if i felt ok and could drive myself.
when i said yes, they said they’d call the hospital and give them my info and let them know i’m coming.
they said i may have to stay for a couple days on iv antibiotics because i had sepsis, an infection spreading through my blood stream.
i had to get lots of medicine, but only stayed in the hospital for one day.
apparently it was so serious because once the infection passes a certain threshold, people go from feeling fine like i did to deathly ill in minutes.
make sure to clean any cuts well right away.
my sister died from a antibiotic resistant blood infection back in 2021. she got a slight sunburn on her lip that got infected and was dead 2 weeks later.
this might not be “immediate trip to the er,” but it certainly is “immediately make a doctor’s appointment asap.”.

chunks.raw_summary: i may have to stay for a couple days on iv antibiotics because i had sepsis, an infection spreading through my blood stream . My sister died from a antibiotic resistant blood infection back in 2021 . Make sure to clean any cuts well right away .
